title: Catalog Entry
description: An entry in the wandelbots catalog

name.description: Name of the entry (e.g. the name of the app). Should be unique in the catalog.

supportsCloud.description: Indicates if the app is supported in the cloud (*.wandelbots.io).

version.description: Version of the entry (e.g app version).

novaOsVersion.description: Version constraint for the required NOVA OS version (e.g. '>= 25.4').

homepage.description: URL to the homepage or github repository with detailed information.

name.description: Name of the app (should be unique in catalog)

appIcon.description: relative URL path to the app icon (e.g. icon served at '/app_icon.png' is simple 'app_icon.png')

port.description: Port on which the app is getting exposed from the container

secrets.description: List of secret identifiers available in the nova instance. This is not required for public available images.

storage.description: The path and capacity of a volume that retains data across application restarts. The maximal requestable capacity is 300Mi

mountPath.description: Path where the storage should be mounted in the container

capacity.description: The amount of local storage available for the application. Example: 100Mi NOTE: The capacity can NEVER be reduced!.

resources.description: Additional resources that the application requires

intel-gpu.description: Number of GPUs the application requires

memory-limit.description: The maximum memory allocated to this application

dependencies.description: List of dependencies for the app
